name: app-azul-webdriverio-android
description: Automation framework for app azul project

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf .tsbuild/ && rimraf allure-results/ && rimraf junit-report/ && rimraf poGenerated/
scripts.start-web: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.chrome.conf.ts
scripts.start-mobile: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.start-mobile-bs: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.bs.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression "@mobile "
scripts.start-mobile-aws: npm run clean && npx tsc && npx wdio run ./config/wdio.mobile.aws.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
